message: Hi, I have been trying to get pricing on your "Watcher" product. I asked for it from your sites "contact" link on the top. I waited for 2-3 days, no answer. Then I sent one more message, waited for 2-3 days, no answer! Sent yet another message, still no answer. (Have checked my spam folder - it's not there either). Can someone help me in this regard? Thanks.
